techmeme.title: Adalytics: DoubleVerify, IAS, and Human Security, paid by advertisers to detect bots, regularly miss such traffic; DoubleVerify missed 21% of bot visits (Patience Haggin/Wall Street Journal)
In the latest Windows 11 preview build, Microsoft removed the "bypassnro" command, which let users skip signing into a Microsoft Account when installing Windows (Zac Bowden/Windows Central)
A US judge rejects Musk's bid to dismiss a lawsuit claiming he defrauded ex-Twitter shareholders by delaying the disclosure of his initial Twitter investment (Jonathan Stempel/Reuters)
Source: the new combined entity housing xAI and X is called XAI Holdings and is valued at more than $100B, not including debt (Bloomberg)
Filing: Intel says three board members will not stand for reelection at its 2025 annual meeting, shrinking the size of the board to 11 members (Arsheeya Bajwa/Reuters)
